content.detailedDescription: I was in bed asleep.I heard slightly different noises than normal in my room(i have a cat,and birds)i raised my head off my pillow,opened my eyes,and i saw the first entity.He was about 4-4.5 ft.Very dark gray,all most a shimmer to his skin.His face was very fat,his eyes very large and beautiful,almost swirling affect to them,he looked at me and said nothing,but i got the impression he wanted me to look over at the rest of my room,next to him,another entity w/in a foot,i looked at it,it "acknowleged"me as well,and then in the corner of my room,right by the window.I then looked back at the closest,he was looking at me,and we seemed to be talking,telepathically,he assured me that i was safe,and they were there to do no harm,(i have been really sick for a long time with chronic infection,and in and out of the dr and hospital).He tilted his head and looked at me,as he "understood i did not feel well"all most "sympathetic"i will never forget his face,and how kind i felt he was.I was never scared.I looked at him again,confirming my safety,and that they were just going to "watch me"or something,i looked at the other 2 told them all i was "going back to sleep then".The closest one looked at me as if to "approve"and i went back to sleep.When i woke,i was afraid to tell my family,i never have had dreams like this,it was so clear,and vivid,and every detail,i went over in my head again,and again.When i awoke,i searched my body for some sign,and found a "silver dollar size"ring on my stomach,to date,nothing has taken it away.I am profoundly affected by this as i do not believe in alien abduction!!!Ever!Though i have seen many crafts all through my life,beginning at age 5,and having actually been "followed"by a u f o,all accounts witnessed,i never believed that aliens would bother with humans!!!I am confused,ashamed,embarrassed,and very distraught over the whole encounter.Now,questioning my sanity.Please,is there any definitive way to know??I am thinking about renting or buying a geiger counter,because i hear they leave traces of radiation?Maybe hypnosis?A lie detector?Anything,so i know i'm not crazy!!The circle all most looks like "ringworm"but has not responded to any medications,cortisone,ketoconozole,any anti fungals,covered,uncovered,the only thing it seems to respond to is "zinc oxide"
content.summary: In my room sleeping,3 entities appeared.Woke me up.Standing right in front of me.

content.detailedDescription: My mother is now 84 and has been telling me all my life that she was abducted maybe several times and i was taken with her when i was two. she is incredibly adamant about this event and it has affected her life greatly.She has been pregnant 7 times full term with four lost, three for unknown reasons. the babies lost were before my birth. she is very disappointed in the united states government for not disclosing the truth about ufo's. she has asked me to try to get her someone who will listen to her story and would like to undergo hypnosis so she can have some peace before she dies. i do not have any memories of her event but i  have witnessed two ufo's one recently. i believe every word she tells me. my last sighting was last july i watched a ufo chase a fire ball across the southwestern sky. the ufo was 3 times the size of the fireball which was really big itself. the ufo seemed camouflaged but was a visible round cylinder. i checked local newspapers the next day for ufo sightings in the area. the only report that i found on the internet were several people traveling on california interstate 10 westbound out of blythe who saw the fireball. my other siting was 12 years ago in the mountains of bishop california 2am in the morning which no one would believe me if i even disclose it in this report. i also have had my right had ex-rayed which shows a small splinter looking metal object between my pinky finger and ring finger. they have no idea what it is, it does not bother me but it is there. this is not a made up story this is true on my mother's behalf and myself. thank you
content.summary: This is my mothers account believes she and i were abducted 48 years ago

content.detailedDescription:
My dad and my grandfather were boating along pearl river banks, hunting frogs. grandfather looks down river and sees a bright wide light beam shining on river and the light is coming from a huge object, flying just above treetop level. the object is long enough to well cover both sides of the river and it's slowly heading their way. 

this thing doesn't make any engine noise or plane / helicopter rotor noise; it is totally silent but clearly under some control and steady speed, moving very slowly. 

dad and grandfather manage to hide their boat behind a heavy low hanging tree branches just along river bank, where they're getting a good look at the ufo as it flies directly over them. grandfather shut his eyes; he was very scared, and began whispering the lord's prayer. dad, however, tried to see all he could of this ufo. he recalled seeing barely inside the opening of the craft that projected the blinding white light; his impression was the ufo was searching inside the river for something. he wasn't able to distinguish the source of the intensely bright light shining down upon them and the river, other than it covered nearly a large square area of the river.

dad isn't sure to this day, being that this all happened many years ago,  but he seems to feel that the natural sounds of the outdoors suddenly ceased as the ufo glided over them--only to hear them again, when the craft moved away from them.

once the object had moved down river and away from them, grandfather and dad got the boat out, started the boat engine and sped scared away from the ufo--which they looked behind them, to make sure it wasn't coming back. dad said the object didn't whoosh away up into space; it remained on it's slow course, as they made distance away from it.


what my dad didn't know: my grandmother, back in 1977, told me this very same account,as told her by my grandfather when they got back; he never spoke of it again. she recalled how scared he was and how excited dad had been. she also told me that the one time, a couple of years later, she tried to discuss the ufo sighting-- my grandfather quickly became angrily upset, demanding nothing more ever was spoken about it.

if deemed fit for further mufon investigation, i'd have to ask dad if he would be willing to himself speak to an investigator. my cellphone number is the perferred way to contact me.

this is not the only ufo sighting my father claims: there are two others, but i'm not clear enough of the details to discuss them here.
content.summary: Prominent in height upon approach, length well covered both sides of pearl river. wide bright beam shone on river

content.detailedDescription:
On a trip to teotihucan in mexico, i toke a photo of the pyramid of the sun. later when i was reviewing my photo, i saw two objects above the pyramid. i didn't see or hear them at the time. my friend toke an almost identical photo approximately 10 seconds after i did and nothing is in her photo.

* the first photo i've submitted is mine. the second is my friends photo taken approximately 10 seconds after. in her photo you can see my head in the lower left corner because i was wearing a red and white bandana on my head. also you can see tourist moving up the steps of the pyramid to show how much time passed between photos.
content.summary: I toke a photo of a ufo at teotihucan mexico. i only saw it after i looked at the photo.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were staying several nights in cape may,new jersey. while walking back to our room one night,we both saw an object fly towards us from over the ocean.The object was diamond shaped,about thirty feet tall and seemed to be comprised entirely of flames. although there was likely a solid object beneath the flames, we could not see it.It flew a few hundred feet off the ground at about sixty miles per hour until it had passed over our heads when it suddenly shot straight up at a very high rate of speed and was out of sight in a second. i now wonder if the flames were due to some type of plasma effect.
content.summary: We saw a diamond shaped flying object that appeared to be made of fire.

content.detailedDescription:
First one was 11 pm,,  friday 13th, 1989 or 1990,  at boy scout camp with fellow scoutmaster,, object observed "flying" to baton rouge airport,, first appeared to be airplane, then stopped in flight,, turned to us, and then appeared to be ball of light, about size of soccer ball, white light, no noise,  descended on perfect straight angle down to us across a lake,  stopped and hoovered about 30 feet away and 30 feet above us, stayed for about 3-5 minutes, and then went across lake to another area,  we reported and spoke with others,, and ended up with other stories to report to you about with regard to this event,,


recently,,  11 pm,  july 4, a couple of years ago,, came home from baton rouge,, arrived at about 9 pm,,  began to bang on all 4 sides of my camper for 2 hours,, and then finally knocked on the door,,  i went out and i somehow knew they were there and where and when to look up to the west,,, when their craft descended down on clear sky,  no noise, about 100 ft disc at tree level about 100 ft away from me,,,  i went to neighbors,  and advised him of what was going on,, and again,  i somehow knew they were coming down again,  advised him to look up,, and they descended down again at his home,, same direction and distance,, i took off to another neighbors,, he remained there for observations,,,    later when sheriff arrived,, said their family saw the same one at ball park week earlier,,,   later for weeks, i would see lights hoovering in the area near me,,  but none lately,,,     i have since heard of others seeing the same craft in this parish,, others that i know,,,   

thanks,,

winston
content.summary: Knocked on my house for 2 hrs, then on my door to come out and see them, and then some,,

content.detailedDescription: I was on the road at night taking a walk and i noticed a bright star-like light. i thought it was a satellite on the horizon. as it moved it didn't disappear behind the hills but shined brightly in front of the hills. it hovered near the bottom of the valley in place for about 30 seconds and then began to move in all directions. at this point i thought it could be an rc helicopter, but it would have had an incredible range, and it was moving in ways that wouldn't have been possible even for an experienced operator. it was too big and bright to be a small rc helicopter, along with being completely silent in the night sky. it seemed to wisp through the valley and across as if it was looking for something or doing something, or possibly a test flight. there was a reddish light further in the distance that would disappear and reappear and move in the same manner as the first. after some time it ascended above the hills into the sky, hovered in place, and took off into the sky in an instant, faster then ive ever seen anything move. it looked like a shooting star going away from the earth. after a minute or two a light just appeared in the area it was flying, light a light switch turned on, and the object continued to ascend and descend and move at varying speeds in all directions, stopping and hovering occasionally. it moved very abruptly, unpredictably, with abrupt stops as well. i stood in awe and felt like a presence, like i wasn't the only one on the road. it was eerie. after a good amount of time of what seemed like random flight patterns, finally it ascended into the sky and took off again, it looked like warp speed or something. it was almost inconceivably fast.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: 2 bright lights moving in impossible directions coming and going, then shot off at impossible speeds and dissapered

content.detailedDescription: Early 1960's in south kansas city,mo. i was playing catch in a neighbors back yard. i looked up to catch the baseball,when i saw a silver object come out from the clouds and hoover. my best friend and i watch it for maybe 30 seconds. we then ran to front  his house where our moms were talking on the driveway. we were excited and told them what we saw flying saucers and to come look. we ran to the back yard and pointed it out.  it went into the clouds and now 4 objects re-emergered and hovered in the sky. the objects then proceeded to move in formation at right angles, darting and stopping. playing in the sky for several moments. then at once they zoomed out sight moving to the east in a blink of an eye! with in a few moments. a jet from then richards-gibaur afb chugged across the sky in pursuit! our moms were shaken and in disbelief! my mom never spoke of the incident and refused to acknowledge that it happened when i asked her about it.  for years i kept to myself. i only found out 5 years ago that my brother was sitting on the front stoop with a female teenager of the home and both also saw the same thing! i knew what we saw was not manmade! the objects performed at a level that is still beyond our technology!  i remember seeing an article in the kc times or star attributing the sightings to "reflections" off of buildings downtown! i never believed that was feasible. i saw something to this day i can not explain!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw one then multiple objects  in northern sky. they moved in right angles in burst of speed then stopped

content.detailedDescription:
Flying humanoid moved from western weehawken toward hudson river and then eventually northeast towards manhattan.

first assumption was qudra-copter or drone, but was moving slowly and no apparent noise. also noticed it was large (human-size or bigger). there was a glare coming off the top of it at times and when pictures are zoomed in, seems like it may have emitted vertical lights as well.

object moved in a straight eastern line than hovered near edge of river on nj side before redirecting path and moving northeast. it had reduced altitude prior to reaching river but then acsended as it moved north.
content.summary: Flying humanoid over hudson river near weehawken

content.detailedDescription: I live in the countryside outside a small town. because my car was being repaired, a student was driving me home from a karate class that i had just taught. halfway up my driveway we saw a large object about fifty feet away and about thirty feet off the ground. it was moving about five miles an hour traveling south. the object appeared to be made of brilliant white light. it seemed to have a solid core but was covered by long tendrils hanging down that seemed to be comprised of large beads of bright white light. the tendrils hung much lower on the left side of the object. my student and i got out of his car and watched the object for 15-20 minutes as it slowly moved away. we could have easily driven back to the highway and kept pace with it as it was moving very slowly. instead,even though it made no noise and looked nothing like a helicopter, i decided that it must be a helicopter and my student agreed. he drove me to my house, i went inside,forgot about the object and went to sleep. the next morning i recalled the strange experience and realized that the object had effected our minds.
content.summary: I saw a large lighted object from my driveway way.

content.detailedDescription: Ido psi related work with my coma victom partner that is closely linked to ufo encounters    we need your help in locating his phisical body we wake and sleep at the same tine which should be confirmable by machine  please put us in contact with a winston salem area investigator i have 12years worth of information please help this is the backdoor to understanding the ufo phonomenan
content.summary: I study multidementional space and its life forms with my coma victom partner

content.detailedDescription: Me & my daughter were taking the kids to wait for the bus, it was still dark out. we noticed what we thought was a large, beautiful bright star high in the sky. we stood there admiring it for few seconds then it grew brighter & shot off! it never made a sound. if my daughter hadn't seen it with me i never would have believed my own eyes! we were both in awe from the experience but we were never brave enough to report it. i can't remember the exact date but i'm certain of the time.
content.summary: Looked like beautiful bright large star. it got brighter then took off. it was gone in a second.

content.detailedDescription: I was on a safari tour of tanzania and we camped by the indian ocean near dar es salaam. i was talking with a dutch member of our group about ten at night when we saw a disk shaped craft in the sky. it was glowing an orangish-red color and traveling away from the earth. we observed it for about ten seconds when it instantly vanished. it was difficult to accurately measure the objects size,speed or distance from us.
content.summary: Saw glowing flying disk in night sky over tanzania.
content.locationName: Dar es Salaam, Dar es Salaam

content.detailedDescription: I was doing my night shift when i suddenly noticed a glowing object like a star coming from a southern direction the glow started to get stronger and suddenly it paused for a second or two with the glow getting stronger and dissapeared,like it went into hyper space
content.summary: Started coming in my direction then changed direction suddenly with the glow geting stronger  then vsnished like it went into hyper space

content.detailedDescription: Just arrived home late,beautiful clear night,i went out side laid down on a lounge chair,stairing at the starlit night.At some point i noticed a really bright star ,no movement thats why i figured it was a star,many stars out that night.So looking around at the night sky i noticed another star with the same intensity of brightness so ok !So i called the wife out but she was to busy with the kitchen,i next reclined the lounge chair,and right straight up over me was another light,at that point i don't remember how long i was out there but the far most light began to move west slow at first then bam it was gone like star treck take off to warp speed.Then next the second light did the same take off both were silent ,well the third orb or star what ever, i herd it start its motor ect,i will never forget the sound it made as long as i live,it went also in the same direction as he other two.So fast it diapeared in a snap,the funny thing is one light came back in the east direction of the space center.Kind of looked like a shooting star going across the sky.I have no memory of how long i was out side that night and have never throught about it until one of my co-workers was talking about one of her grand parents sightings.This same lady said something to me after i shared with her ,!!She said for you to hear the ufo it must have been very close to you! i never saw it until it took off food for throught .I was twenty seven years old then,there was no ufo stuff back then no nothing that could do what i saw these things do.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright round light

content.detailedDescription: There was a storm moving in and the clouds looked very odd.  it looked more like a tornado than a storm cloud.  we took 8 pictures all within seconds of each other and in one frame there is clearly a visible object.  there was no sound, not even wind.  it was very calm.
content.summary: Taking pictures of storm clouds and it showed up in picture

content.detailedDescription:
My neighbors and i were sitting on the grass in the park area located behind our homes, playing with our dogs and chatting. it was early evening and the sun had not set yet and the sky was clear and blue. i clearly saw a slow, very low flying dark colored object headed our way.I first saw it approaching the corner light pole about 250 ft from where we were sitting. the altitude of the object caught my attention. a dark colored mylar balloon probably. 
then i observed the level flight path as it came into full view not a balloon
the appearance was very hard to judge it seemed to be changing and blurry.
it flew behind the tall palm tree 150 ft. distance away and the palm frons
blocked our vision for 4 to 5 seconds. we were all scratching our heads now saying to each other "what the 'h' is that ?" the object made a slow arching turn around the larger trees in the park area to the south and began to ascend. i picked a stationary spot to focus on as not to lose it in the sky as it ascended for 2 to 3 minutes to the south. it was silent.

the object itself appeared to be 2 to 3 ft. round, oblong. shiny dark brown
but hard to look at because of its changing form, and it was blurred.
my reaction and of my neighbors who witnessed the event also is one of
well i guess we all saw a ufo because we cannot identify what the flying object was..We know what it wasn't.

i'm sure we are all waiting for a rational explanation that is going to satisfy us logic based species. but sometimes there just isn't one !
but it sure makes life interesting huh?
content.summary: A slow moving,very low flying (less than 80 ft) 150 ft. distance away, dark colored object was seen by many in the daylight and blue skies.

content.detailedDescription:
This arial phenomenon appeared in the same spot as it did several months ago, at that time i called 911 it hovered for almost an hour, this time it was there again, same exact spot, hovering, same type of lights blinking, i was waiting for the morning train.The blinking caught my eye i thought it was a star until i saw colored lights. it just hovered over a hospital. i felt intuitively they were letting me they are here. i did not lose sight i video taped it on my amazon fire phone, all you can see is he shimmering lights blinking.  
the video is on my phone i hope i did this correctly if not please notify me to see how i can send it maybe by email?
content.summary: Blinking star like lights make a return

content.detailedDescription: I was up on my roof top having a smoke and and sat down to look at our city's skyline i live in mid town west sooo times square is very in your face and i noticed 7 objects fluttering falling like birds sooo i watched more intently tlhen realized they were not and that they had lights on them and would change direction and angles and at first i was like maybe they were drones watching times square !?!?  soo crazy at this moment i am sooo pissed i only have my iphone and cannot get good pics or video because of the dark but i shot these  and they came out..
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: At first i thought they were huge birds flying and fluttering around the tops of the sky scraper and they were being reflected by the light then i watched more intently and they had intelligent design blinking lights  crazy flight patternsi

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: My two daughters and i were swimming at my aunt and uncles house in sperry, ok. it was close to 9:00pm, still having some daylight but starting to get dark. i told the girls it was time to get out and go to their grandma's house. my youngest daughter gets out of the pool, away from the shrubbery, looks up and says, "what is that?" she's young, a little paranoid sometimes, so with me still being in the pool and whatever she was looking at out of my view i dismissed her concern and said that it was probably an airplane. even more so setting my mind at ease is the fact that there are quite a few wealthy people in the area so its not uncommon to see someone flying an older plane, something she may not recognize. my aunt and uncle had already went inside for the evening, but the girls noticed her grandson left his shoes out by the pool and that my aunt had left her drink outside too. they started knocking on the door to the house because it for some reason was already locked, but no answer. i was still by the pool getting dried off, but thought it was rather strange that no one could hear them knocking and calling for them. once dried enough to leave, i decided to go help the girls try to get my aunt's and/or uncle's attention. i walked over to the clearing by the door and started knocking and calling for my aunt, but no one answered. they had only went in a couple of minutes before we were getting out of the pool, they couldn't be asleep. i got a rather uneasy feeling, and for whatever reason my daughters question as to what was in the sky came front of mind. i looked up and saw two lights coming from a stationary object, the object itself was disc shaped and dark. i repeated my daughter's question back to both of my girls, "what is that?" at this point i felt like we were being watched and i wanted to leave. i told the girls to put the cup and the shoes they were trying to take inside on the table outside and that we needed to go. i walked back over towards the pool to grab our bag of towels, and when i walked back over to the clearing i felt compelled to look again. so i did, it was much closer than it was before, still just hovering. i noticed that the object was completely silent as well, and for some reason related it somehow to my aunt and uncle not being able to hear us. the girls looked back up in the sky before walking to the car, and also noticed how much closer the object was with its lights seeming to be pointing in our direction and they started becoming frantic. we got to the car and started to drive off, but to our surprise, when we got to the end of the driveway, the object was just above the trees across from the driveway almost as if it knew where we were going and was there waiting on us. it was so close at this point that my heart just sank, it was within 100 feet. to me that confirmed my suspicion that it was somehow after us. in my mind, i felt panicked. seeing this object on the other side of the street meant that this object switched paths from heading south to facing the north without anyone seeing, hearing, noticing. i mean it's a pretty rural area, but it made me feel even more alone in trying to protect my children from whatever this thing is stalking us, but making its presence known. we turned east onto the rural road and it followed to the right of us. i lost sight of it as i was focusing on driving and trying to hightail it out of there, but the girls could see it. everyone is panicked now. the youngest was in the backseat and i heard her start crying and then praying. i gave the older of the two my cell phone and told her to call her step dad, he answered, but the call dropped. i turned some christian music on and started praying with the girls. it either left at that point, or else we just could no longer see it, either way was fine with me as showing itself out in the open seemed pretty confident and aggressive. if its hiding now at least the agression has somewhat simmered down, if its just gone then thank goodness even more so. we got to my parents house and i felt one of the biggest reliefs of my life. although, i barely slept in the night and noticed every single noise. strangely, about 10 years ago something very similar happened close to the same area. i would say probably within a 5 to 10 mile parameter. it was july 4th 2005 to be exact, evening time i believe. my ex husband and i were driving, taking the back roads. i believe we were actually on a road just two blocks south of the one from the june 24th incident, just a few miles east. we were driving, and when we came into a clearing, we saw a low flying object just hovering. we both noticed it, and then it silently started moving towards us. he started speeding, and i just kept looking at it. i gave it a glare with the thought in my head, whatever i have to do to protect my kids, i'll do it. our oldest two were in the backseat and i was pregnant at the time. i don't know if it had anything to do with my thought of no holds barred, but at that it simply started moving away from us.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo was hovering, switch directions, and briefly gave chase

content.detailedDescription:
I was out filming objects in the sky and i was was at the rec park in livermore falls.

what made me notice the objest was the color in the sky

a ufo

it came from the northwest and headed out in a large boomerang type circle and headed out to the southeast. after looking at the video, i was able to see 8 individual lights in a cirle with one light in the middle.

i was very excited and overjoyed. i called a friend who also saw one of the objects and i kept on filming. afterwards, i was very satisfied as i had alos witnessed two other ufo's before but, did not have my camera with me.

i lost sight of the objects as they just got far away and then blinked out.
content.summary: Noticed brightly yellow-orange lights in the sky moving slowly and began to film.

content.detailedDescription: I 'am a photographer and am" astronamer . i took a photo of the moon quite some time ago" when i started going though old photos and found this photo of the moon . i started to blow the photo up and noticed these two pod like objects ( they look like the pods they once sold too the public in the 50's and 60's ). the objects are there today " i checked again after i noticed them in the picture's
content.summary: Object on the moon

content.detailedDescription: It w exatly 9:08p.M. (21:08) we my mother and i headed out to eat, we live acouple of blocks down a fast food restaturant. we were crossing the street wehen i decided to watch out for cars and down the block there was a slgihting of red loghts around the downtown are of el paso what it seem was 3-6 lights orbs floating around 50-90 feet above the floor a couple of other people saw the sight as well i've been trying to get a hold of pictures with no luck. i took a picture but its awful to be honest. i tried to associate it with the border patrols helicopter but noticed there was no sounds coming from the object. at around four minutes later the objects appear to be moving west bound, i didn't know what to think about the time.
content.summary: Red flashing around the dowtown area floating around 50-90 meters above it

content.detailedDescription: On sunday, june 21 at approximately 2230 hours, my wife and i were sitting on our back patio underneath our deck enjoying the beautiful clear night at our lake. our neighbors to the north of our house were all out in their backyards sitting by a fire pit. i decided to get up and go grab a drink when a light in the sky caught my attention. i immediately told my wife to stand up and look at it. it was the strangest thing i had ever seen in the night sky. a bright yellow orange light surrounded by an orb a vapor. i immediately ran into the house to grab my binoculars to try and get a better look at the object. in hindsight i wish i would've grabbed my camera. i yelled over at the neighbors to look up in the sky and they were all witness to the same thing i was seeing. the object flew north east and a medium to slow speed maintaining an even and steady altitude. as the object got farther away it seem too dim and slowly disappear as if it were being cloaked. the object did not make any noise at all it was completely silent. i am retired military of 22 years, a pilot, and i am in law-enforcement. i have never witnessed anything like this before
content.summary: A bright light with a vapor like orb around it flying ne at approx 1500 feet

content.detailedDescription: I was in my room about to go to sleep but i hear a little humming noise.Then the only thing i remember is the three figures standing over me while on a cold metal chair. then the next thing i know i'm in my room woke up in a state of fear and curiosity. the past years i seen 42 different ufos i've dedicated my life to research and knowlage of ufos.
content.summary: I was an abductee

content.detailedDescription: I first spotted the object at about 10:20pm pacific standard time, on june 24, 2015,  flying over the city of monterey park, just about 15 minutes east of downtown los angeles.  it appeared to be flying at about a 45 degree angle above my line of sight.  it looked to be about a mile or two away from me.  it had a bright orange, fiery appearance, as if it was flaming.  it looked slightly more rectangular than round.  i watched it for about 15 minutes as it faded away into a white or grey colored roundish object.  it moved very slowly, not like a shooting star.  it seemed to change direction slightly in a left/right/left motion.  i tried videotaping it but was unable to successfully tape it.  as of now, 12:06am,pst, i still haven't heard any news of the sighting.
content.summary: Object first appeared to be rectangular shaped with a bright orange, fiery appearance.  it faded into a white, roundish object.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i drove from madera ca to fresno ca pick up his mom from church. on our way home when we were getting into madera ca gateway drive i was sitting in the back seat of car my friends mom told us look there is 2 ufo's. my first reaction was what ever there no ufo's sitting there when she pointed them out i was shocked, my friend  as well. at this time it was like 7:45pm close to 8 pm it was just dark enough to see the lights that were just sitting in the sky floating or what i call it floating on water like a ship floats in the ocean it was amazing to see. my friend pulled over on gateway drive right under the floating light we jumped of the car and watched the ufo's just float in the air for like 3-5 minutes. we wachted in amazement on how the lights faded from color to color red,white, blue, purple,green,yellow, it had two rings of lights  one bigger then the other it look like they were communicating to each other after a few minutes one took off east floating away traveling no more then maybe 2-5 miles hrs. the other ufo started traveling north on gateway going 2-5 mph. it was making a full circle as it floated down the main road of our town it almost look like they were surveying the town. as it traveled it would come to a complete stop at our 9oclk and just float for 15-30 seconds then it repeated the same movement 3 different times stopping 1st over our museum park you could see it thru the tree lines then it stopped over the tallest building during that time madera valley in the last stop was made over the greyhound station. after the greyhound the ufo floated away towards the driving theater area my friend dropped me off at my home. from my house i could see the light still floating in the driving theater area my town is small so i called my nephew that lived right behind that theater drive inn i told him to look for the light while we were on the phone. he started screaming it's a ufo at that time my nephew was maybe 12-14 years old. so i just watched the lights from my house for 3 hrs as the floated away traveling nw towards san jose ca. i have never seen something like that again. i'm 39 years old now i still wonder what i saw that night i know for a fact it was not an aircraft that we have on earth even now almost 19 years later.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 ufo's sitting together communicating

content.detailedDescription: I was about 11 0r 12 and at ymca camp we were saluting the flag as it. was being raised , a gunmetal greydisc came over making no sound ,without windows approx 40, or 50 ft in diameter turned up and shot out of sight. was seen by every one and interupted the ceremony. scared everyone. it @ctrd like it was surprised we were there.
content.summary: While raising flag in the morning at ymca camp a discshaped object came ovef at tree top level

content.detailedDescription: While stargazing between two thunderstorm systems,i observed 3 satellite looking objects traveling in the same direction and azimuth.I believe that they were not self illuminating,since they faded from view and the same latitude.While travelling in a southward direction
content.summary: Multiple within 5 minutes

content.detailedDescription: When driving up american fork canyon,stop to eat a tanking photos of the canyon as i was taking photo i got a photo of the mountain in the sky part of the photo there was a dark gray circle with a wight point on one side and it was in the comtril of the plane it was behind.  in the other photos it is not there
content.summary: It was dark gray sircle with a wight point
